NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CYCAD: I have faith... You can do it! 2 1 OENO: No! It scampered off again... 3 2 OENO: You saw the vision orb move up slightly, didn't you, Cycad? Neither of us were looking directly at it! 4 3 OENO: I have been adjusting our vision orbs to accomodate the native lifeforms' vision, you see! I am hopeful the native species will learn to use them soon. 5 4 COLEUS: I wish I could credit their eyes, Oeno - but I'm afraid it was more likely the Attlerock's gravity pulling the vision orb upwards as it orbited overhead.. 6 5 OENO: Was the Attlerock orbiting overhead just now? Oh, how maddening! 7 6 CYCAD: Still, it is a joy watching you teach and play with the native species, Oeno. I am sure they will thrive to learn from the universe themselves one day! 8 7 OENO: That is my hope too! It is lovely seeing these lifeforms learning and growing as they become more comfortable with our presence. Campsite Orb EX1 6
